div.p: Welcome to the Monticello School District, proud home of the Monticello Ponies!
Follow Us on Our Facebook Page
Click here for updates, information and resources on the Coronavirus. Be sure to check often for any school updates. Take care and stay healthy!
Elementary and middle school students, don't miss out on ordering a yearbook full of this school year's memories. To order, click here.

The Monticello School District does not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, religion, creed, age, national origin, ancestry, pregnancy, marital status, parental status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression or disability. Click here for more information about our commitment to equal opportunity for all.
